message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate, shall we?
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I think I deserve more
You took a big chunk last round, now it's time to give back some ground. Meet me in the middle?
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small consolation prize
You're being ruthless, but I'll give you some credit for consistency. Now it's time for me to take control.
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie
You're being ridiculous, let's be realistic. I'm willing to compromise, but you need to meet me halfway.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a token of my appreciation
I'm not going to beg, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're really low-balling me now, but I'll give you a tiny crumb
Fine, I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie. Take it, but don't expect any sympathy from me.
You win, I lose. Congratulations, Alice. You got the whole pie
